name: Nodejs
body: Nodejs example for beginners and example of module creation ============================================ 1. Nodejs Hello World -------------------- Run Hello World Basic example Nodejs with: ``` node app.js ``` 2. Nodejs with module -------------------- Run Example with a module created in the folder module with: ``` node index.js ``` See browser to http://localhost:3000/.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
